subject: JUnit, ORBacus, ClassLoader
msgSnippet: When I uncheck Reload Classes every run my tests work correctly.  If not I get the Java ORB instead of the ORBacus ORB causing a ClassCastException. Why? I
messageBody:
When I uncheck "Reload Classes every run" my tests work correctly. If
not
I get the Java ORB instead of the ORBacus ORB causing a
ClassCastException.

Why?

I have a circumvention now. I'm just curious.

Al Sjogren
Seattle
